snippet: Brian Mulligan and Lisette Oropesa, two rising Metropolitan Opera stars, performed in the much smaller setting of the Morgan Library on Sunday.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by Metropolitan Opera singers Brian Mulligan and Lisette Oropesa at the Morgan Library & Museum.
lead_paragraph: Brian Mulligan and Lisette Oropesa, two rising Metropolitan Opera stars, performed in the much smaller setting of the Morgan Library on Sunday.
